template.name: term_rejected
template.description: Send an email to participant to inform him that the term he proposed is rejectd.
template.subject: The glossary term you proposed at PGIST is rejected.
template.content:
Dear participant of PGIST,
The glossary term "${term.name}" you proposed at PGIST is rejected.
The moderator of PGIST gives the following reason:
${reason}
Thank you for your participation.
PGIST group.
